Hi, I’m Doğan – a fullstack developer ba: Hi, I’m Doğan – a fullstack developer based in Munich with a strong passion for coding. What excites me most about web development is the ability to bring ideas to life and create solutions that truly help people.
My path into tech wasn’t a straight line: My path into tech wasn’t a straight line – it was a conscious decision. After working on my first small projects, I quickly realized how much I enjoy development. I love exploring new technologies, solving problems, and continuously improving. Today, I enjoy building fullstack projects, especially in team environments where collaboration and learning go hand in hand.
I’m someone who’s not afraid to dig deep: I am fascinated by the endless possibilities of programming—creating something from scratch and seeing it come to life is what drives me. I’m currently seeking an opportunity where I can apply and expand my skills as a junior developer.
